story.heading: Our Story
paragraphs: Founded in 2023, TecNoBand emerged from a simple observation: managing IoT devices at scale was becoming increasingly complex and time-consuming. Our founders, experienced IoT engineers and data scientists, saw an opportunity to leverage artificial intelligence to automate and optimize device management.

Today, we serve over 500 enterprise clients worldwide, managing more than 10 million connected devices across industries including manufacturing, healthcare, smart cities, and logistics. Our platform has evolved to become the industry standard for intelligent IoT management.

faq.question: What is TecNoBand and how does it work?
faq.answer: TecNoBand is an AI-powered IoT device management platform that helps enterprises monitor, control, and optimize their connected devices at scale. Our platform uses machine learning to provide predictive maintenance, real-time analytics, and automated device management.

faq.question: How secure is the TecNoBand platform?
faq.answer: Security is our top priority. We employ enterprise-grade encryption, multi-factor authentication, role-based access control, and regular security audits. All data is encrypted in transit and at rest, and we comply with industry standards including SOC 2, GDPR, and ISO 27001.

faq.question: What types of IoT devices are supported?
faq.answer: TecNoBand supports a wide range of IoT devices including sensors, actuators, gateways, and edge computing devices. We offer SDKs for major IoT protocols (MQTT, CoAP, HTTP) and can integrate with custom devices through our flexible API framework.

faq.question: What kind of support do you offer?
faq.answer: We offer multiple support tiers: Basic (email support with 24-48 hour response), Professional (priority email and chat with 12-hour response), and Enterprise (24/7 phone, email, and chat support with dedicated account manager and 1-hour SLA). All plans include access to our comprehensive documentation and community forums.

faq.question: Can I try TecNoBand before committing?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer a 14-day free trial with full access to all platform features. No credit card required. You can connect up to 10 devices and explore all capabilities including AI analytics, predictive maintenance, and real-time monitoring. Our team is available to help you get started.

faq.question: How does pricing work?
faq.answer: Our pricing is based on the number of connected devices and features you need. We offer flexible plans starting from $99/month for small deployments up to custom enterprise pricing for large-scale operations. Volume discounts are available, and we offer annual payment options with additional savings.
